result.purpose: Responsible for providing a client interface to interact with the KyberSwap API for token swaps and related functionalities.
result.architecture: The folder follows a modular architecture pattern, encapsulating the client logic and models for the KyberSwap API, with separate files for implementation and testing.

internal/infras/kyberswap/client.go.purpose: Defines a client for interacting with the KyberSwap API for token swaps and related functionalities.

internal/infras/kyberswap/client_test.go.purpose: Unit tests for the KyberSwap client functionalities.

internal/infras/kyberswap/models.go.purpose: Defines models and request structures for interacting with the KyberSwap protocol.
